the_purple.title: The Purple
the_purple.description:
Download: %%download_link%%
Minecraft Java Edition Version: 1.21.9/10

This game requires players to use a resource pack! The resource pack can be found on the download page.

Follow us on Twitter: %twitter_link%
Join our Discord server: %discord_link%

The Purple is a fresh take on the classic game of tag. Explore alien landscapes, collect unique artifacts, and avoid The Purple infection! In a unique twist, players are never truly eliminated. Spectators can affect the gameplay, and sometimes even rejoin the game. With many maps, settings, advancements, and more, there is always something new to discover.

================================================

Map made by: Stuffy and nightlibra

Trailer made by: Blocky

Song: "Exoplanet" by Creo
%song_link%
